Package Interfaces

Interface EntityFormatter

All Known Implementing Classes:
Entity, EntityDecorator, Person, Project
public interface EntityFormatter
Contains Strings to be used to print Entity overviews to the terminal. Should only be modified if the database structure changes.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String

    • PROJECT_OVERVIEW_FORMAT

      static final String PROJECT_OVERVIEW_FORMAT
      The format used when showing each project in a list, to be used with a Formatter like in .
      Parameter indices in formatter
      indexspecifierparameter
      0%dproject number
      1%sproject name
      2%sproject address
      3%sproject type
      4%dproject ERF number
